column4: anyone got an idea for retrieving login and password from ubuntu studios 8.04?
you can't retrieve a password, but you can change it to something else
reboot the system in Recovery Mode (when the system starts booting, hit escape to get into the grub menu, and choose recovery mode)

then run "less /etc/passwd" to read the passwd file, which lists users. Find the user you want to change the password of, and run the command "passwd username" (but use the username you found), and enter the new password.
